backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, storage mixins, and data models for referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, access requests, and activity logs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files for quick reference in build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment checklist detailing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the system.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based OKLCH color system and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TESTS.md: Manual smoke test guide outlining steps to verify a working production deployment with emphasis on admin access behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router handling authentication, admin detection, profile setup, and dashboard selection.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an Access Pending screen for non-admin users without assigned roles and provides a logout option.
frontend/src/components/AccessRequestsTa: Displays pending access requests and supports approving with a Principal ID or deleting requests.
frontend/src/components/ActivityLogTab.t: Fetches and paginates activity log entries, formatting users, actions, entities, and timestamps for display.
frontend/src/components/AdminRiskOvervie: Shows a compact risk dashboard summarizing at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds with navigation to full views.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusCheck: Displays admin status, caller principal, and all admin principals with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/BedsTab.tsx: Manages bed listing, filtering, assignment, editing, archiving, and deletion with admin-specific preferences.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Displays referral, intake, and bed statistics with loading skeletons and status helpers.
frontend/src/components/FacilitiesTab.ts: Provides UI for managing facilities and adding beds with validation and mutation actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows app header with branding, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/IntakesTab.tsx: Manages intake creation, review, bed assignment, exit processing, notes, and case manager updates.
frontend/src/components/PartnerAgencyPro: Allows partner agencies to view and update their profile with validation and save actions.
frontend/src/components/PartnerReferrals: UI for partners to view, create, edit, and resubmit referrals, including form handling, validation, document upload, and status display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to submit basic profile info and trigger profile creation via API.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: Staff/admin view for listing, filtering, reviewing, and updating referral statuses, including messaging and internal notes.
frontend/src/components/ReferralStatusBa: Renders a status badge with icon, label, and variant styling based on referral status.
frontend/src/components/RequestAccessFor: Form allowing agencies to request system access and shows a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/components/StaffOverviewCom: Dashboard-style summary of referrals, intakes, and beds with at‑risk indicators and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Renders a timeline of status history entries with labels, timestamps, and user info, sorted newest first.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Displays pending and active users, allowing admins to assign roles and view user information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Provides a timestamp that updates every minute for UI time freshness.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, partner agency data, and other backend resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for overview, referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, access requests, user management, and activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity authentication with an option to request access and basic app information.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerDashboard.tsx: Partner dashboard providing tabs for managing referrals, submitting new ones, and editing the agency profile.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboard.tsx: Staff dashboard offering overview, referrals, intakes, and bed management through a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/utils/atRisk.ts: Utility functions to detect at-risk referrals, intakes, and beds and return human-readable labels.
frontend/src/utils/bedTrackingPreference: Utility for loading, saving, clearing, and defaulting user bed tracking preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/referralFilters.ts: Referral filtering utilities for program, status, and date range, plus combined filter application.
frontend/src/utils/referralValidation.ts: Validation utilities for referral form fields with error detection and user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/referralWaitingTime.t: Functions to calculate and format referral waiting time and check if a referral is overdue.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them, with precedence rules for URL over stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, container settings, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s purpose and a detailed list of implemented features for authentication, access control, roles, and workflows.
